name: Don't Hit Me
description:
A MOBA which is all about MISSING your abilities! Gain score when using abilities, but be mindful, others will steal score from you when hit.

Multiplayer, 3 - 4 Players (preferably 4).

In case you're missing players: Discord https://discord.gg/ZCG2ne9zVV

The game features four heroes, all with their unique abilities:

  • ROBERTO: An old robot who can fire lasers and buff himself
  • CACTI: A cactus that likes placing spikes on the ground and ambush others
  • KIARA: She can control time to duplicate abilities and change timescale
  • THORSSON: Able to control lightning to punish anyone messing with him

Controlls:

  • WASD - move
  • Mouse - aim / look around
  • LMB - Basic Attack
  • Q - Skill 1
  • E - Skill 2
  • Space - Ultimate
  • L Shift - Support

Don't Hit Me is currently in an early development state, and I'm grateful for any feedback!

Made with Unity & Netcode for GameObjects.
